artist: Painter: After Giovanni Lanfranco; Engraver: John Corner
description: self-portrait of the artist; partially bald, with moustache and small beard; wearing black cloak with large flat white collar; rectangular frame with a circle below image; in circle, image of a man wearing a crown with an angel above him, a man at right and 2 men at left in background
inscription:
Signature, and Title,  

in plate in black: Ipse pinxit   J. Corner inc\'t/ GIOVANNI LANFRANCO
title: Portrait of Giovanni Lanfranco
